learning_objective: Develop plans that describe a program’s sequence of events, goals, and expected outcomes.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is working on a program that translates musical notes into frequencies (in Herz). The program should take a note as input and return the corresponding frequency. The original code only contains a start but Alex isn't sure what they should do next. What steps should Alex take next to complete their program?",
    "Answer1": "Add a sequence condition to recognize different musical notes and assign them their respective frequencies.",
    "Answer2": "Create a loop that will keep assigning frequencies randomly to each note, until it finds the right one.",
    "Answer3": "Hard code each frequency for every possible musical note.",
    "Answer4": "Connect the program to a musical instrument to input the frequencies automatically.",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "Alex could create a sequence of conditions that, given a certain musical note as input, would return the corresponding frequency. This would allow the program to work properly, without having to brute force or manually input all the frequencies.",
    "code_snippet": "text note = getUserInput()\nif note == \"A\"\n    output 440.0\nend if"
}
